languages.text: {n}Вы резко вскидываете голову — в кабинете есть еще кто-то! Поднявшись на ноги и оглянувшись, вы видите их — десятки и десятки мертвецов, обступивших вас. Среди лиц мелькают изуродованные и окровавленные лики тех, кто пал на мостике корабля, и тех, кого вы встречали в своей предыдущей жизни. Как они попали сюда? Где блюстители, охраняющие кабинет? Неважно: вы од{mf|ин|на} против орды еретиков, восставших из черноты против вас!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы резко вскидываете голову — в кабинете есть еще кто-то! Поднявшись на ноги и оглянувшись, вы видите их — десятки и десятки мертвецов, обступивших вас. Среди лиц мелькают изуродованные и окровавленные лики тех, кто пал на мостике корабля, и тех, кого вы встречали в своей предыдущей жизни. Как они попали сюда? Где блюстители, охраняющие кабинет? Неважно: вы од{mf|ин|на} против орды еретиков, восставших из черноты против вас!{/n}

languages.text: {n}You raise your head with a start: someone else is here, in your study! You stand up and stare at the dozens upon dozens of corpses surrounding you. Among their number, you recognise the disfigured and bloodied faces of those who died on the ship's bridge and those you met in your previous life. How is this possible? Where are the enforcers posted to stand guard? It matters not: you are alone against a horde of heretics risen from the darkness to take your life!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы резко вскидываете голову — в кабинете есть еще кто-то! Поднявшись на ноги и оглянувшись, вы видите их — десятки и десятки мертвецов, обступивших вас. Среди лиц мелькают изуродованные и окровавленные лики тех, кто пал на мостике корабля, и тех, кого вы встречали в своей предыдущей жизни. Как они попали сюда? Где блюстители, охраняющие кабинет? Неважно: вы од{mf|ин|на} против орды еретиков, восставших из черноты против вас!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You shoot your head straight up: there is someone else in the room! Standing up and looking around you see plenty of the dead surrounding you. Among them you notice disfigured and bloodied faces of those who died at the bridge of the ship and those you met in your previous life. How did they get here? Where are the overseers that guarded the room? It doesn't matter: you are alone against a horde of heretics that rose against you from the darkness!{/n}

{n}You shoot your head straight up: there is someone else in the room! Standing up and looking around you see plenty of the dead surrounding you. Among them you notice disfigured and bloodied faces of those who died at the bridge of the ship and those you met in your previous life. How did they get here? Where are the overseers that guarded the room? It doesn't matter: you are alone against a horde of heretics that rose against you from the darkness!{/n}

{n}You quickly lift your head: someone else is here! Standing up and looking around, you see dozens upon dozens of corpses surrounding you. Among them you pick out the disfigured and bloodied faces of those who died on the ship's bridge and those you met in your previous life. How did they get here? Where are the enforcers guarding this room? It doesn't matter: you are alone against a horde of heretics risen from the darkness to drag you down!{/n}

{n}You quickly lift your head: someone else is here! Standing up and looking around, you see dozens upon dozens of corpses surrounding you. Among them you pick out the disfigured and bloodied faces of those who died on the ship's bridge and those you met in your previous life. How did they get here? Where are the enforcers guarding this room? It doesn't matter: you are alone against a horde of heretics risen from the darkness to drag you down!{/n}

{n}You raise your head with a start: someone else is here, in your study! You stand up and stare at the dozens upon dozens of corpses surrounding you. Among their number, you recognise the disfigured and bloodied faces of those who died on the ship's bridge and those you met in your previous life. How is this possible? Where are the enforcers posted to stand guard? It matters not: you are alone against a horde of heretics risen from the darkness to take your life!{/n}

languages.text: {n}你惊愕地抬起了头，你的书房里还有其他人！你站起身环顾四周，看到几十具尸体将你围在中间。你看着这些尸体，辨认出了他们血肉模糊的面孔，既有死在舰桥上的人，也有你上船之前遇到的人。这种事情怎么可能会真的发生？守卫这个房间的执法者在什么地方？这些都不重要了——你要独自对抗这支从黑暗中崛起的异端大军，他们打算夺走你的性命！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You raise your head with a start: someone else is here, in your study! You stand up and stare at the dozens upon dozens of corpses surrounding you. Among their number, you recognise the disfigured and bloodied faces of those who died on the ship's bridge and those you met in your previous life. How is this possible? Where are the enforcers posted to stand guard? It matters not: you are alone against a horde of heretics risen from the darkness to take your life!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你惊愕地抬起了头，你的书房里还有其他人！你站起身环顾四周，看到几十具尸体将你围在中间。你看着这些尸体，辨认出了他们血肉模糊的面孔，既有死在舰桥上的人，也有你上船之前遇到的人。这种事情怎么可能会真的发生？守卫这个房间的执法者在什么地方？这些都不重要了——你要独自对抗这支从黑暗中崛起的异端大军，他们打算夺走你的性命！{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous redressez la tête dans un mouvement de surprise : vous n'êtes pas {mf|seul|seule}, il y a quelqu'un d'autre dans votre bureau ! Vous vous levez et regardez le cortège de cadavres qui vous entourent. Parmi les visages défigurés et ensanglantés, vous reconnaissez quelques membres de votre équipage morts sur la passerelle du vaisseau, ainsi que des personnes que vous avez connues dans votre ancienne vie. Comment est-ce possible ? Où sont passés les prévôts chargés de monter la garde ? C'est sans importance. Ce qui est certain, c'est que vous allez devoir vous défendre contre une horde d'hérétiques surgis des ténèbres pour vous abattre !{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You raise your head with a start: someone else is here, in your study! You stand up and stare at the dozens upon dozens of corpses surrounding you. Among their number, you recognise the disfigured and bloodied faces of those who died on the ship's bridge and those you met in your previous life. How is this possible? Where are the enforcers posted to stand guard? It matters not: you are alone against a horde of heretics risen from the darkness to take your life!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous redressez la tête dans un mouvement de surprise : vous n'êtes pas {mf|seul|seule}, il y a quelqu'un d'autre dans votre bureau ! Vous vous levez et regardez le cortège de cadavres qui vous entourent. Parmi les visages défigurés et ensanglantés, vous reconnaissez quelques membres de votre équipage morts sur la passerelle du vaisseau, ainsi que des personnes que vous avez connues dans votre ancienne vie. Comment est-ce possible ? Où sont passés les prévôts chargés de monter la garde ? C'est sans importance. Ce qui est certain, c'est que vous allez devoir vous défendre contre une horde d'hérétiques surgis des ténèbres pour vous abattre !{/n}

languages.text: {n}急いで顔を上げると…他に誰かいる！立ち上がってあたりを見回すと、何十という死体に取り囲まれていた。その中には、船のブリッジで死んだ者や以前会ったことのある者の、醜く変形した血塗れの顔もあった。どうして彼らがここに？この部屋を警護するエンフォーサーたちはどこにいった？そんなことはどうでもいい…闇から甦り、引き摺り込もうとする大勢の異端者たちに対して、自分がたった1人なことに気づく！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You raise your head with a start: someone else is here, in your study! You stand up and stare at the dozens upon dozens of corpses surrounding you. Among their number, you recognise the disfigured and bloodied faces of those who died on the ship's bridge and those you met in your previous life. How is this possible? Where are the enforcers posted to stand guard? It matters not: you are alone against a horde of heretics risen from the darkness to take your life!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}急いで顔を上げると…他に誰かいる！立ち上がってあたりを見回すと、何十という死体に取り囲まれていた。その中には、船のブリッジで死んだ者や以前会ったことのある者の、醜く変形した血塗れの顔もあった。どうして彼らがここに？この部屋を警護するエンフォーサーたちはどこにいった？そんなことはどうでもいい…闇から甦り、引き摺り込もうとする大勢の異端者たちに対して、自分がたった1人なことに気づく！{/n}

languages.text: {n}Levantas la cabeza de un respingo. ¡Hay alguien en tu estudio! Te pones de pie y miras a tu alrededor. Te rodean montones de cadáveres. Entre ellos reconoces los rostros desfigurados y ensangrentados de quienes murieron en el puente y de gente de tu vida anterior. ¿Cómo es posible? ¿Dónde está el personal de seguridad? Ahora mismo no importa. ¡Estás sol{mf|o|a} ante una horda de herejes salidos de la oscuridad que buscan cobrarse tu vida!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You raise your head with a start: someone else is here, in your study! You stand up and stare at the dozens upon dozens of corpses surrounding you. Among their number, you recognise the disfigured and bloodied faces of those who died on the ship's bridge and those you met in your previous life. How is this possible? Where are the enforcers posted to stand guard? It matters not: you are alone against a horde of heretics risen from the darkness to take your life!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Levantas la cabeza de un respingo. ¡Hay alguien en tu estudio! Te pones de pie y miras a tu alrededor. Te rodean montones de cadáveres. Entre ellos reconoces los rostros desfigurados y ensangrentados de quienes murieron en el puente y de gente de tu vida anterior. ¿Cómo es posible? ¿Dónde está el personal de seguridad? Ahora mismo no importa. ¡Estás sol{mf|o|a} ante una horda de herejes salidos de la oscuridad que buscan cobrarse tu vida!{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hebst schnell den Kopf: Jemand ist hier! Als du aufstehst und dich umsiehst, siehst du um dich herum Dutzende und Aberdutzende von Leichen. Du erkennst unter ihnen die entstellten und blutigen Gesichter derer, die auf der Brücke des Schiffs gestorben sind, und derer, denen du in deinem früheren Leben begegnet warst. Wie sind sie hergelangt? Wo sind die Enforcers, die den Raum bewachen? Es ist gleichgültig: Du stehst allein gegen eine Horde von Ketzern, die sich aus der Dunkelheit erhoben haben, um dich hinabzuziehen!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You quickly lift your head: someone else is here! Standing up and looking around, you see dozens upon dozens of corpses surrounding you. Among them you pick out the disfigured and bloodied faces of those who died on the ship's bridge and those you met in your previous life. How did they get here? Where are the enforcers guarding this room? It doesn't matter: you are alone against a horde of heretics risen from the darkness to drag you down!{/n}

languages.translation_comment: Растемнение: кабинет игрока, игрок стоит рядом, FX варпа, поставить по краям экрана полупрозрачные фигурки людей

languages.text: {n}İrkilip başını kaldırıyorsun. Çalışma odanda yalnız değilsin! Ayağa kalkıp etrafını saran onlarca cesede bakıyorsun. Geminin köprüsünde ölenlerin ve önceki hayatında tanıştığın kimselerin biçimsiz ve kanlı yüzlerini görüyorsun. Bu nasıl mümkün olabilir? Nöbette olması gereken infazcılar nerede? Önemi yok. Canını almak üzere karanlıktan çıkan koca bir kâfir sürüsüne karşı bir başınasın!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You raise your head with a start: someone else is here, in your study! You stand up and stare at the dozens upon dozens of corpses surrounding you. Among their number, you recognise the disfigured and bloodied faces of those who died on the ship's bridge and those you met in your previous life. How is this possible? Where are the enforcers posted to stand guard? It matters not: you are alone against a horde of heretics risen from the darkness to take your life!{/n}
